basic.floral_language:
Gerbera jamesonii 
Floriography: elegant, plain, pure
Gerbera jamesoniiis very beautiful. Under sunlight, like dazzling little stars in clusters or clumps.Gerbera jamesonii resist cold weather, even frost, therefore loved by the public in the fall season, and are often well loved by the ancient literati. 
Gerbera jamesonii like sunny days, mainly blossom in September-November for 3-4 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period November-April, viewing period 3-4 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, avoid strong direct light, but also tolerates shade
maintenance.watering: Keep soil moist, water and drain timely
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: After flowering remove the withered flowers, the part on the ground will wither in winter, the plant germinates again in spring
